references.paper_title: Best subset selection via a modern optimization lens
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational work for best subset selection using modern optimization techniques, which is central to the proposed differentially private model selection method.
This paper introduces the concept of differential privacy, a cornerstone of the privacy-preserving techniques adopted in the proposed algorithm.
This paper presents the exponential mechanism, a key tool for designing differentially private algorithms, which is utilized in the proposed method for private best subset selection.

references.paper_title: Variable selection via nonconcave penalized likelihood and its oracle properties
references.reason: This paper establishes the theoretical foundation for non-concave penalized methods in high-dimensional regression, which provides a theoretical basis for understanding model selection in the high-dimensional setting.

references.paper_title: Best subset, forward stepwise or lasso? analysis and recommendations based on extensive comparisons
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive comparison of various variable selection methods, including best subset selection, which is crucial for evaluating the performance of the proposed differentially private method.
